name: Brave Shield
effect: [Main] Unsuspend 1 of your Digimon. Until the end of your opponent's next turn, that Digimon gains ＜Blocker＞. (When an opponent's Digimon attacks, you may suspend this Digimon to force the opponent to attack it instead.)
security_effect: [Security] Unsuspend 1 of your Digimon. That Digimon gains
